n = int(raw_input())
nc = n
while n:
	k = int(raw_input())
	kids = raw_input().strip(" ").split(" ")
	pencils = raw_input().strip(" ").split(" ")
	# print kids, pencils
	kids = [ int(x) for x in kids ]
	pencils = [ int(x) for x in pencils ]
	
	kids = sorted(kids)
	pencils = sorted(pencils)
	
	# print kids, pencils
	nums = 0
	
	for i in range(k):
		nums += abs(kids[i] - pencils[i])
	print "Case " + str(nc - n + 1) + ":", nums
	
	n -= 1
